= Alpha Build Release Notes =

Below are release notes for recent alpha builds.  See [AlphaBetaTesting this page] for access to alpha releases.

== Next alpha ==
Changes to the app structure to make development easier:
  * Reading plans now use OSIS references to fix single chapter book, and non-English reference problems.
  * Can build using Gradle (see [CompilingAndBibleSourceCode])
  * Components kept in synch using EventBus rather than mediator and listeners.
